metadata.name: Digital Fractures
metadata.description:
Digital Fractures

NOTHING IS SAFE. It is just an illusion that our brain unconsciously shows us.

Today I want to show you a spoiler of what you will see in the coming days…
Let’s start the story from the drawing from which this project was born.
The message

This work tells the experience of trauma that we all live for different reasons. Even if I’m really young I lived in my life extreme moments and situations that changed me but today I’m not here to tell you that, there will certainly be an opportunity in the future.

In the web universe as in real life there aren’t certainties, nothing is sure.
People experience different traumas every day; wars, bankruptcies, earthquakes…
All these tragedies have in common the trauma that people involved suffer.
